URS - The Unified Redirection Service

Hello! You're here a bit early. We're still working on this exciting project -- The Unified Redirection Service.

This is an internal service that aims to provide my applications to utilise the domain, yyj.app and generate short & temporary links.

In the meantime, feel free to check out my website.

Warm regards,
